name: Starck
description: Starck (STK) is a Binance Smart Chain token based on the BEP-20 standard, characterized in the AI, Burn and Staking categories. Starck has the following key features: integration with artificial intelligence (AI) and custom algorithms for advanced analysis, strategic supply reduction program through mass token burning (BURN), several types of stake options with limited stake packages included, as well as compatibility and security provided by the BEP-20 standard. STK tokens are used for Starck Staking, providing opportunities to receive flexible rewards and to access the AI Starck Information Platform (ASIP), developed for monitoring and analyzing the Cryptocurrency, Stock, Forex, and Commodity markets.
